channel.title: Productivity on Strange Aeons
channel.description: Recent content in Productivity on Strange Aeons

item.title: Email Management
item.description: After bumping into an old colleague in the supermarket before christmas, during which I mentioned how I hadn’t had a reply from them to an earlier email, we got to talking about email management approaches. I think I sent my first real email sometime in September of 1997. That said I’m pretty sure we sent emails on the Acorn BBC Master machines in our IT class at high school. I keenly recall the teacher being really pleased with the ability to send “electronic mail” between computers in the school.
